items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Nice Fabric + Pockets
items.body: I ordered the MEDIUM and it Fits me perfectly. I'm 5'7" Tall, weighing around 144lbs. I was impressed by the quality. The fabric is not that cheap t-shirt fabric too many companies use. It's very pretty. The dress has a pattern of lavender and violet flowers. You'll love the POCKETS. I know I do. PS. Please ignore the purple sleeves behind this OfeeFan Dress in the picture. Read more
items.author: LivingLife LIKE ItReallyMatters2ME

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty dress
items.body: This dress is very cute; lightweight, silky smooth. The pattern looks exactly like the picture. This is a dress that you can wear casually or make it dressy with accessories like high heels. It’s true to size. Read more
items.author: JJoplin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin material
items.body: I ordered this dress and when it arrived i was happy the print looked as advertised. The fabric is very thin and the shiny polyester blend type of fabric which feels very cheap to me. I do like the pockets and that there are cute ruffles on the sleeves. The fabric is comfortable and light for the summer. The fit is true to size but a bit longer than it looks on the model. Its an affordable dress and is still worth the buy. Read more
items.author: Brit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: This dress is super cute and I love the way it hangs and doesn't cling to my body. I received many compliments when I wore it. Read more
items.author: L. Teter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable with pockets
items.author: Christina B.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric choice read pajamas more than stylish dress
items.body: I could be partially to blame because it ordered a size up because I don't like it to be tight across my chest, but the material of this dress is a stretch jersey which just screams pajamas. I have a black dress in the same style that is a viscose/creoe material and doesn't remotely look like pjs I wear it to work and out to dates. I try to envision this in the correct size but the material will always lean to pjs. I can't say it's shapeless because it is cut with curves in mind, the sleeves are cute, and it has pockets! It is thicker material which is nice. I've considered doing some alterations to size it down better but the material again just doesn't make this dress feel elevated enough to be an actual dress. Read more
items.author: Amanda B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: It’s very nice dress and the material is very soft Read more
items.author: very good product helped my eyebags disappear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Review
items.body: Super cute. Great deal. I got a small 5'0" 125lbs Read more
items.author: Farley

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Print 01, Print 12, Print 02, Print 03, Print 04, Print 10, Print 11, Print 09, Print 05, Print 06, Print 07, Print 08, Plain Navy Blue, Plain Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
